<!--cf906140f33d8803c4a75a2196329ecb-->
ð This pull request conflicts with the target branch and [needs rebase](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#rebasing-changes).

<sub>Want to unsubscribe from rebase notifications on this pull request? Just convert this pull request to a "draft".</sub>

Hello John,Is this regarding the request I made yesterday.?

On Sat, Dec 19, 2020 at 6:26 AM John Newbery <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> This continues the work of moving application layer data into
> net_processing, by moving all ping data into the new Peer object added in
> #19607 <https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19607>.
>
> For motivation, see #19398
> <https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/19398>.
>
> The first three commits are review suggestions from #19829
> <https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19829>.
> ------------------------------
> You can view, comment on, or merge this pull request online at:
>
>   https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20721
> Commit Summary
>
>    - [net processing] Add comment about destructing Peer objects
>    - [net processing] Move nStartingHeight to Peer
>    - [net processing] Rename nStartingHeight to m_starting_height
>    - [net processing] Move block inventory data to Peer
>    - scripted-diff: rename vBlockHashesToAnnounce and
>    vInventoryBlockToSend
>    - [net processing] Move hashContinue to net processing
>    - [net processing] Fix/improve comments for Peer
>    - [rpc] Fix ordering of fields in getpeerinfo help text
>    - [net processing] Guard m_hash_continue with m_block_inv_mutex
>    - [net processing] Move send ping message logic into function
>    - [net processing] Move ping timeout logic to net processing
>    - [net processing] Move ping data fields to net processing
>    - scripted-diff: rename ping members
>
> File Changes
>
>    - *M* src/net.cpp
>    <https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20721/files#diff-00021eed586a482abdb09d6cdada1d90115abe988a91421851960e26658bed02>
>    (29)
>    - *M* src/net.h
>    <https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20721/files#diff-422879cc8bfac56d4380c865f381b58afeb344bc355bbc7f47c581e4491b6b4b>
>    (27)
>    - *M* src/net_processing.cpp
>    <https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20721/files#diff-6875de769e90cec84d2e8a9c1b962cdbcda44d870d42e4215827e599e11e90e3>
>    (203)
>    - *M* src/net_processing.h
>    <https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20721/files#diff-2a4e846ad2d76a4e7a6f6c46a68b3603de372f435a93b7c0fcabadccc0ed86a5>
>    (49)
>    - *M* src/qt/rpcconsole.cpp
>    <https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20721/files#diff-cec3a0a10196329610d46fbd0e01ce6496e5ae9e23c057d8012d48c2f0d3b5c9>
>    (7)
>    - *M* src/rpc/net.cpp
>    <https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20721/files#diff-2ae094f9329ce9498e1b4a9cb7767945b54a33b4ee9fed4f0ba401a98e1683c1>
>    (23)
>    - *M* src/test/denialofservice_tests.cpp
>    <https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20721/files#diff-a4c9875091483bafb92d8ccaa035dff408a7a5c44e5b4eb55ff51fb0e5112ed2>
